name: Rupture Strike
author: CrusaderDroid
desc:
When you damage a creature with a melee weapon attack or an attack created by a Water spell, you can cast this spell before rolling damage. The attack painfully ripples through the creature's blood and destroys a number of hit dice equal to your spellcasting stat, dealing 5 damage for each destroyed die. If there are not enough dice left, the damage for each excess die is doubled, and the target must make a Constitution saving throw or be stunned until the start of your next turn.

The spell can't affect a creature without blood.
